## Generate random number for marginal distribution of treatment group

```{R}
mean = 50
sigma1 <-  13
sigmab2 = 135.3
delta = seq(0,50, by=0.1)
n=100
z1 = 1.96
q1 = z1* sqrt(sigmab2) 
p = pnorm(q1, mean = delta, sd = sqrt(sigmab2), lower.tail = FALSE)
idx <- min(which(p >= 0.8))
delta[idx]
```
